item.title: PREP - Don't Look Back (Feat.Shownu,So!YoON!)
item.description:
Guess we’ll shoot
this in split screen
All those
double meanings
Let’s go back
to that last scene
And
roll it again
Watch his eyes
while he’s wrecking
All the peace
you’ve been working on
Dropping
by to check
What’s still
in the air
Where’s your real life
can you find it
Can you see
what’s there
Let’s get the opening
right
If this is
the end
Annie don’t look back
he won’t be following
Keep on down
the track
That’s how you’re
going to win through
I know he’s got
the kind of love
That makes you think
about giving up
But Annie
don’t look back
Don’t look back
just walk away
Something
he’s got you hiding
Little notes
in the lining
When was
I meant to find it
And
work this all out
Takes me back
in an instant
To the time when it
first went down
I though
we’d put some space
Between then
and now
Where’s your real life
can you find it
Can you see
what’s there
Let’s get the next
start right
If this is
the end
Annie don’t look back
he won’t be following
Keep on down
the track
That’s how you’re
going to win through
I know he’s got
the kind of love
That makes you think
about giving up
But Annie
don’t look back
Don’t look back
just walk away

Annie don’t look back
don’t look back
Annie don’t look back
don’t look back
Annie don’t look back
don’t look back
Annie don’t look back
don’t look back
